price: These are the ones whose hearts, hearing and sight are sealed up by Allah[68]; it is they who are the heedless.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ طَبَعَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ وَسَمۡعِهِمۡ وَأَبۡصَٰرِهِمۡۖ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡغَٰفِلُونَ
footnotes: [68] Because they did not use their faculties of perception to seek guidance.
